title: Basement Watchdog BWD-HWA Water Sensor and Alarm : Basement...
description:
Buy Now - http://www.abt.com/product/68513/Basement-Watchdog-BWDHWA.html
Shop Sump Pumps - http://www.abt.com/category/1184/Sump-Pumps.html

Features

For installation in sump pits or near areas requiring water monitoring like hot water heaters air conditioners near washers or under sinks. Requires a 9-volt battery (Sold separetly).
Solid state circuitry is extremely sensitive and reliable
Detects water only 1/32 deep when the alarm is placed on the floor. The Sensor has a 6-foot wire so it can be extended into a sump pit or mounted on a wall and stretched to another location. (Accommodates the addition of more than 100 feet of wire if needed)
Loud 110dB alarm can be heard throughout the house
Battery-saver feature keeps batteries fresh longer... for 24 to 48 months
